room_title: Escape room "Crimson Ashes" by Exhilarating Escapes in Bloomington
room_description: Inspired in-part by Ted Kaczynski and first-hand experience with graduate school stress, in this room you will investigate a graduate student convicted of a bomb plot who escaped from the local asylum. The details surrounding the convict's arrest seem questionable, and you begin to question his guilt. Come be judge and jury, in this "decide your own adventure" style room, where your final decision alters the ending!
